insert into textbook_tag (title, isbn, author, publisher, edition, original_price, course_id) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update textbook_tag set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edition = #{edition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_price = #{originalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, title, isbn, author, publisher, edition, original_price, course_id from textbook_tag
